title: I got demoted for winning in ranked, Please tell me why RIOT ???
body:
I was in Diamond 5  with 47 LP, just played one ranked 2 mins ago . I won and then I got demoted straight back to Plat 1 with 96LP.
Can RIOT please explain this to me ?

replies.body:
It might be due to this here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/HQM1bbta-complete-ranked-decay-coming-back-july-28

Please have a read there and see if that explains it.
